channel.title: Cant get server to run
channel.description:
ok i have tried 2 make my own server i have everything ineed but when ever i click on run.exe this comes up in command promplet
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
and i am on vista i kno thats a problom there but if any one knows a way to fix it please tell me i want to run my server and ive tried 10 sorces alredy and Nothing works so please say if u know.

item.title: Cant get server to run
item.dc:creator: @thenewguy thenewguy
item.description:
@thenewguy wrote:

Is the Path in system varriables?

Read full topic

item.title: Cant get server to run
item.dc:creator: @camus129 camus129
item.description:
@camus129 wrote:

[quote=“thenewguy, post:12, topic:255498”]ok only thing i can tell u is to make sure that your “classpath” is this

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%

and to make sure that your “Path” is

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;[/quote]
not working still

Read full topic

item.title: Cant get server to run
item.dc:creator: @thenewguy thenewguy
item.description:
@thenewguy wrote:

ok only thing i can tell u is to make sure that your “classpath” is this

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%

and to make sure that your “Path” is

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;

item.title: Cant get server to run
item.dc:creator: @Swift1 Swift`
item.description:
@Swift1 wrote:

It’s PATH and CLASSPATH, use capitals.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant get server to run
item.dc:creator: @camus129 camus129
item.description:
@camus129 wrote:

[quote=“thenewguy, post:9, topic:255498”]your environmental varriables are not set correctly I had the same problem before and i corrected my environmental varriables and the problem was solved[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 08:54:57 pm[/size][hr]do u have it set for the correct java u are using?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 08:55:27 pm[/size][hr]and make sure u downloaded JDK not JRE[/quote]

ok what should i do? and btw the 1st big pic i didnt have enough space 2 type it in big enough[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 08:57:11 pm[/size][hr][quote=“thenewguy, post:9, topic:255498”]your environmental varriables are not set correctly I had the same problem before and i corrected my environmental varriables and the problem was solved[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 08:54:57 pm[/size][hr]do u have it set for the correct java u are using?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 08:55:27 pm[/size][hr]and make sure u downloaded JDK not JRE[/quote]

ya i have for right i have jdk 6 updat 11

Read full topic

item.title: Cant get server to run
item.dc:creator: @thenewguy thenewguy
item.description:
@thenewguy wrote:

your environmental varriables are not set correctly I had the same problem before and i corrected my environmental varriables and the problem was solved[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 08:54:57 pm[/size][hr]do u have it set for the correct java u are using?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 08:55:27 pm[/size][hr]and make sure u downloaded JDK not JRE

item.title: Cant get server to run
item.dc:creator: @camus129 camus129
item.description:
@camus129 wrote:

Swift`:

Compile it first, if that doesn’t work Vista may require you to run it as an administrator.

ive tried but when i use compile this comes up

‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

and i am loged in as administrator

Read full topic

item.description:
@camus129 wrote:

ok i have tried 2 make my own server i have everything ineed but when ever i click on run.exe this comes up in command promplet

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server
